reviews.comments: Excelente departamento, hermoso y cómodo. Cerca de muchísimos lugares para comer, bosques de Palermo, jardín japonés, trasporte, delivery todo. Muy bueno y recomendable. Perfecta comunicación en todo momento, tanto con Stacy (dueña) como con Hilda, quien se encargó de entregar y recibir el departamento.
Gran dpto! Amplio, luminoso y re contra bien ubicado! El mejor Palermo!
El departamento es hermoso y muy cómodo! Está muy bien ubicado también! Stacy y su colaboradora fueron muy amables! Quedamos muy contentos! Súper recomendable!
La ubicación del departamento es muy buena, nos recibió Hilda con gran amabilidad. El departamento en si, muy agradable, amplio, super confortable.  Tuvimos una excelente estadía.

Somos una familia de Argentina viviendo en el exterior. Fuimos de visita Asique la zona ya la conocíamos bien, es lindisima, con muchos restaurantes con onda y recomiendo la panadería Santa Paula que tiene cosas riquísimas. Muchos supermercados y todo a una cuadra o dos de distancia. Un placer! En general conseguíamos lugar para estacionar bastante fácil pero de mi ser así hay dos estacionamientos a una cuadra. La zona muy segura y muy habitada hasta tarde en la noche. El departamento tiene un pulmón de manzana divino, con un sol radiante que entra por las ventanas, espectacular ! Las fotos reflejan la realidad del departamento. Estaba todo muy limpio con muchas toallas y sabanas. El encargado del edificio muy amable. Hilda quien nos recibió, muy amable y accesible. Pasamos una estadía lindisima y súper cómoda. Por supuesto que volveríamos a ir. Gracias Stacy.

El departamento de Stacy es hermoso, tal cual se ve en las fotos. Está muy bien ubicado, cerca de todo, pero a la vez una zona muy tranquila. El departamento está muy bien equipado, con todo lo necesario para pasar unos días. 
Hilda fué muy amable con nosotros. 
Muy recomendable, seguramente lo volveremos a tener en cuenta para otros viajes a Buenos Aires.
Todo bien, Stacy muy pendiente de todo y la Sra Hilda muy atenta. El Depto es super comodo, amplio, limpio y seguro,  El barrio tambien es tranquilo, cerca de todo y lejos de la locura.
Realmente muy comodos y el dpto era como es en la publicacion!! Muy buen lugar. Barrio supertranquilo y seguro!! Gracias

Hermoso departamento, muy comodo, bien cuidado. El lugar es ideal cerca de restaurantes en zona muy bonita y con negocios. Tambien esta al paso de varios museos. Super aprovechable. Stacy deja todo arreglado para que te sientas muy comodo.
El apartamento es muy lindo y la ubicacion es perfecta para hacer turismo
La casa estaría bien si tuviera mejor mantenimiento . No andaba el aire acondicionado del salón , no andaba lavavajillas , luces sin funcionar ... cocina sucia y con cucarachas... :( una pena.
reviews.response: Just as a response for future renters: I was just in the apartment in November (visiting from the states) and did not see one roach. Hilda keeps the apartment spotless so I don't believe this review as I was just there. The part that is true is the air conditioner needs to be replaced in the living room- I bought a new one in November and it just needs to be installed. The dishwasher needs to also be replaced because they can't find the part that it needs so I need to buy a new one but that doesn't feel urgent as most people aren't cooking that much anyway while there are visiting. just as an fyi...:)

reviews.comments: El apartamento es excelente, impecablemente mantenido, con una ubicación inmejorable, con todos los servicios y transportes cercanos. Nos encantó estar ahí. Superó nuestras expectativas. Hilda resultó todo un personaje: eficiente, agradable, culta, y de gran apoyo. Volveremos donde Stacy cada vez que visitemos Buenos Aires!

Nos fue bien en el apartamento de Stacy, ubicación perfecta, nos recibieron bien, y tuvimos contacto con Hilda. Las instalaciones en cuanto a cuartos a baños son muy buenas, las camas, los linos, la limpieza, todo super!, tuvimos desafortunadamente un poco de problemas con las zonas sociales, ya que están un poco averiadas, en cuanto a la cocina y a la sala.

Dpto es precioso y muy bien ubicado en Palermo. Atendió perfectamente nuestras demandas. 2 habitaciones y 2  baños. Cocina bien equipada. Living amplio. Buen wifi y cable. Retraso en el check-in en un día de lluvia en Buenos Aires. Dificultad para contactar la anfitriona y la persona designada por ella. Excelente relación costo-beneficio.
Quedamos conformes con el apartamento y la estadía.

Muy bien cómodo
Tiene todo lo ofrecido
Muy bueno
Lo recomendamos en un 100%
Todo muy bien! Hilda muy atenta y buena onda.

Apto muy bien ubicado, ideal para estadía de dos parejas de amigos.
Limpio, cómodo y completamente equipado.
Apto muy hermoso. Gracias

Muy buen dto , cómodo , luminoso, buena ubicación y servicios .  
Cafetería cercanas y de gran calidad.
Hilda muy atenta y sin duda vale la pena volver.

Este apartamento esta muy bien ubicado en Palermo. Las habitaciones son cómodas y las zonas comunes (estudio, cocina, comedor y sala) son espaciosas y bastante iluminadas. El edificio es realmente muy tranquilo, perfecto para una estadía con la familia.
La limpieza del apartamento y entrega de llaves la hace Hilda. Sugiero acordar con ella la hora de la limpieza, a mí me paso que llegaba en la tarde cuando llegábamos de caminar todo el día y era incómodo para mi familia poder descansar. La limpieza en sí del apartamento puede mejorar.
El mayor incidente que tuvimos fue cuando descubrimos que una de las bañeras tenía una gotera e inundaba el baño. Por esta razón tuvimos que bañarnos siempre en uno de los baños. Desafortunadamente, uno de los criterios para seleccionar este apartamento fue que tenía 2 baños completos y pague un 30% por esta característica. La resp
reviews.response: Gracias Daniel por eso-me  ayudo mucho para mejorar el departamento. :)

reviews.comments:
Hilda, la persona a cargo del departamento muy buena persona.
El departamento limpio y espacioso, las camas cómodas.

Tuvimos un problema con las fechas de la reserva, Stacy pensaba que llegábamos el sábado 21 de mayo hasta el lunes 23 de mayo, cuando en verdad llegábamos del viernes 20 al domingo 22 de mayo. Por suerte tuvimos suerte de encontrar a Hilda en el departamento. 

Para el check out también tuvimos algunos problemas porque me habían dicho que no había problemas con la hora de salida cuando en realidad el mismo domingo llegaban otros huéspedes. Hilda llegó el domingo diciendo que llegaban nuevos huéspedes así que tuvimos que hacer las maletas rápidamente, alcanzamos a toparmos 20 mins con los otros huéspedes. 

Fuera del inconveniente de las fechas de la reserva, todo bien.-
reviews.response: Mil disculpas Vanessa! Estaba visitando mi mamá en la Republica Dominicana y el internet fue terible. Por eso recordé sus fechas incorrecto. Muchisimas gracias por su generosidad! :)

reviews.comments:
El apartamento colmo todas nuestras espectativas. Stacy se preocupó de todos los detalles para que nos sintieramos como en casa. Hilda nos atendio de maravillas. Esperamos poder volver en cualquier oportunidad.
Gracias por todo.

El departamento está en una zona muy linda y está muy bien cuidado por Hilda. Hay algunas hormigas en la casa que deberían eliminar pero está en una condiciones óptimas.

La propietaria siempre muy dispuesta aunque me confirmó un late check out y luego lo desmintió cuando pudo alquilarlo.

En general una buena opción aunque las fotos dan una idea diferente al parecer más nuevo y los baños son pequeños.

Lo mejor, la ubicación y el trato de Hilda, la persona encargada de l limpieza y el cuidado del departamento.

Excelente departamento y trato. El departamento está muy bien ubicado, es amplio, limpio y silencioso. Qué más? A cinco cuadras a la redonda se pude comer comida de cualquier tipo, y tener acceso a todo lo que uno pudiera necesitar. Voy seguido a Buenos Aires, y seguro intentaré volver a quedarme aquí si estuviera disponible.

100% recomendable. El departamento esta equipado con todo lo necesario y a dos cuadras tienes supermercados, restaurantes, farmacias... en un barrio muy seguro y lindo para pasear. Stacy respondio siempre muy rapido a cualquier consulta y la Hilda la chica que limpia tambien. Flexibilodad de horario de entrada y salida que es muy importante cuando viajas. En generañ un 10 en todo. Si vuelvo a Buenos Aires seguro que nos volvemos a alojar allí. Muchas gracias

El apartamento está muy bien equipado, es amplio y cómodo. En la librera hay varias guías de Buenos Aires que nos fueron muy útiles. La ubicación es excelente para moverse entre Palermo y Recoleta a pie. En los alrededores hay muchos restaurantes, supermercados e incluso atracciones como el MALBA, que está a cinco minutos.

El departamento fue muy agradable, tiene muchos extras que no esperábamos, libros, teléfono, plancha, etc. La zona es segura y tiene cerca restaurantes y cafeterías. Stacy respondió siempre muy pronto a todas las preguntas. Fue un placer estar en el departamento.
100% Recomendable el departamento, excelentes condiciones y seguro. Es muy céntrico de fácil acceso a los principales puntos de atracción.

El apartamento es excelente, muy acogedor y cómodo y está muy bien equipado. Stacy e Hilda son muy amables y están en todos los detalles. La ubicación también es muy buena, el barro es agradable y cuenta con todos los servicios necesarios (farmacia, supermercado, restaurants, etc.) a pocas cuadras del edificio. Lo recomiendo.

El departamento de Stacy es muy cómodo y lindo en un barrio residencial tranquilo y lleno de parques para caminar. Precioso!  Además hay muy buenos restaurantes alrededor. Para llegar a La Recoleta o Palermo Soho se puede caminar pero son hartas cuadras por lo que tomar un taxi es lo más recomendable.
Stacy está muy atenta a todos los detalles y nos sentimos como en casa. Hilda se encarga de la limpieza y es encantadora.
Fue una experiencia muy buena ir al departamento de Stacy! Muy recomendable.
Muy buen apartemento! Súper recomendado!

Realmente recomendable!! El apartamento es precioso y como se enseña en las fotos. Todo estaba muy cuidado y Stacy dejó recomendaciones de sitios donde almorzar y cenar en los alrededores, además de instrucciones, números de teléfonos etc, para hacer muy facil y agradable la estancia. Me encantó el feeling de esta casa, con las estanterias con libros y que hacen sentirse a uno como en casa. La zona es muy linda y hay mucho que ver y por encima de todo, Stacy se portó muy bien desde el principio, estando totalmente pendiente de que me sintiera comodo. Volveré seguro!!

Great, muy lindo departamento !
He pasado aqui una semana con mis 3 hijas y el departamento est muy confortable, en invierno hay buena calefaccion, mucha agua caliente y todo lo necesario para cocinar. Las camas son muy confortables y hay un king size en la grande habitacion parental. Tambien hay 2 cuartos de bano. Todo funciona bien y Stacy esta disponible desde Estados Unidos, siempre contesta muy rapidamente a emails o por telefono. Que buena semana, gracias Stacy e si volvemos a Buenos Aires, seguro que te contacto para volver en tu departamento. Tambien, abajo hay supermercados, farmacia, todo lo que hace falta y nos fuimos caminando hasta el Jardin Japones y  el Jardin zoologico, ppero hay muchos taxis e colectivos para la gente quien no puede caminar. Suerte e un saludo. Gaëlle (de Francia)

Stacy's apartment is very well located, walking distance to many shops, cafes and restaurants. Also not very far from lively Palermo Hollywood and also downtown Buenos Aires. The place is comfortable and very well equipped.  Would definitely go back.
The host canceled this reservation 71 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Amazing apartment in one of the best zones of the city. Is close of some of the best attractions and super quiet neighborhood. We really enjoy our time here, we hope we can back in the future, great place!
The place was really nice, location is great and the house manager Hilda was very kind. Me and my family were really happy with this department. It is like in the pics. Recommended!

We really loved staying at Stacy's apartment! It is spacious, very well-equipped, clean and well-kept. We stayed for two weeks and felt really at home. The location is truly wonderful: pretty, lively, yet quiet. There are plenty of nice restaurants, shops, the Malba and other museums, beautiful parks - and a children's playgrounds just a couple of blocks away. All perfect for a happy stay with a toddler!
Stacy was always very friendly and accomodating and easy to reach. I highly recommend her place and hope to rent it again sometime !!!

Ich habe die Wohnung zwar für meine Familie reserviert, war aber die Hälfte der Zeit auch dort. Die Wohnung war mit allem bestückt, was man sich in einer Wohnung wünscht. Es gab sogar ein Einkaufswägelchen, damit man die Einkäufe nicht nach Hause tragen musste. Zudem war die Wohnung sehr modern, hell und vor allem ruhig. Die Ruhe haben wir am meisten geschätzt, da dies in Buenos Aires nicht selbstverständlich ist. Die Wohnung war auch gut gelegen. Es hatte gute Restaurants in der Nähe und Stacy hat eine Liste mit Restaurantempfehlungen hinterlassen, was wir toll fanden.

The word "cozy" describes perfectly stacy's apartmanet, we stayed for 8 days with my family and we feel like home. This is so because it's an almost inhabited apartment for their owners having everything you need for cooking, spend time reading, etc. It's perfectly located in lovely area, starbucks block away, small park for the kids, restaurants, bar, deliverys, markets, all near. The apartment has the maid service three times a week and Hilda is great, she will do anything to make you feel relax and enjoy yor stay. I recommend absolutly this apartment
Easy access from the apartment to the local activities. Apartment is quiet so you can get a good night's rest after touring around.  Would come back again.
Well placed flat and good communication with the host.
Great location, large space and great value for this apartment. Host is very communicative and friendly. Highly recommend!
We loved our stay at the apartment! It was very clean and Stacy was very accommodating. The perfect BA getaway location.

We stayed with my family in Stacy's place. The location is great, the place is clean and suitable for 2 couples. The balcony is very nice and the views to the courtyard adds a nice local touch. Our flight got delayed and we could only check-in really late, but they were very considerate and everything worked out perfectly. Will recommend it and stay here again.
Thanks for everything Stacy and Hilda!
Amazing location spacious 2 bedroom and 2 bathroom apartment

Wow! As a newbie to BA, Stacy’s place was ideal! I got the convenience of a wonderful apartment and the ease of a great location. That patio is my dream space! The apartment is spacious and Stacy’s help was priceless!
Beautiful apartment, very comfortable beds. Nice, quiet neighborhood close to many parks. Stacy and house manager Hilda were great

My family and I had a great time at Stacy's apartment. The bedrooms are very spacious and the beds are super comfortable. It's located in a great spot with restaurants and the rose gardens in walking distance, but also near main streets where you can catch the bus or subte anywhere you need to go! We would have loved to spend another week here! The washing machine and library were a fantastic bonus :)
Great place! The place is better than it looks in the picture, very spacious and amazing location.
Great location, wonderful apartment and great communication with Stacy ;)

This place is wonderful! A pearl in the middle of one of my favorite neighborhoods in Buenos Aires.  It is super comfy and very well located close to restaurants, bars and parks.  We really loved our stay and super recommend it.  PS: they have great books.
The apartment was well equipped and in a great location. Would definitely stay there again if I have the opportunity to return to Buenos Aires

The best feature is the location. Quiet part of Palermo but a short cab ride to Palermo Soho. Nice and clean with firm beds and wifi & cable to boot. Within walking distance to the botanical garden MALBA
and the Recoleta cemetery

I almost don't want to write this review so I can keep this secret to myself! The photos were a selling point but don't do justice to the experience itself! We arrived expecting much less and got a great deal more in terms of spaciousness, location, comfort and safety. 

I would say the ONLY downside to this place is that you can hear people walking around upstairs (if they are wearing heels!) Fortunately, those times were minimal and usually we were on the same schedule anyway. 

Hilda is the house manager and we had a lovely first introduction and she showed me the place and answered a lot of my questions. It was a really nice way to start off the visit, given what a lovely person she seems to be!

The apartment really DOES feel like home to me. The amenities are compact, efficient and functional for every day use and everything is squeaky clean. The real beauty of this apartment is that there are windows everywhere, letting light in all day long. The balcony spans the entire unit, which is unique and at night you can pull down the shutters and sleep like a baby! The beds are super comfortable and the building is extra safe, with 24-hour tv monitoring of the front door right from the flat screen TV in the living room. 

Also a major plus is that this apartment is in Palermo in a quiet but accessible neighborhood with lots of closeby restaurants and parks. If you want hustle, bustle, this is not the place for you but if you want to have a home away from home and be part of a beautiful, cosmopolitan Argentinian vibe, then this is definitely the place! We'll be back again. Thanks Stacy....
Very cosy place, the neighborhood is elite and quiet. 15min walking distance to the subway station if taxi is not the first option.
Nice apartment well located in Palermo and close to restaurants.

Lovely apartment, I highly recommend it. The Host was great and very accessible. We felt very comfortable staying at Stacy's. I must say though( and this has happened at every apartment I've stayed in B.A) you can definitely hear your neighbors upstairs.

We stayed at Stacy's for six weeks and everything was great. About a ten minute walk to the closest subway stop, and three minutes to a central bus stop. Tons of supermarkets, stores, cafes, bakeries, etc nearby. The apartment was very comfortable for four adults (two couples). The kitchen was very well equipped which was great because we cooked a lot. Hilda, the housekeeper, was very kind and helpful. All in all, we'd recommend this place for short or long term stay.

The apartment is great; it has large, well-lit spaces with homey but modern vibes. There were enough clean towels for everybody and then some, and the beds are just great –especially the California king in the master suite. Really good choice.

Excellent location to explore the city by public transport and on foot.
Very safe neighborhood with lots of cafes and restaurants near by.
Clean and homey apartment with high security.
Highly recommended.
Great location and very quiet to boot. Nice and hot showers and clean white towels. Stacy was on hand to provide regular restaurant recommendations throughout the stay. Highly recommended.

The apartment is lovely, very clean, comfortable, very well located. Stacy (owner) is very organized, always available in case help is needed. Hilda, who receive guests, is a very nice person, always happy to help. We totally recommend this apartment to stay at Buenos Aires! (The library is great, please, enjoy, but do not take Stacy's books!)

I definitely recommend this place for your next stay in Buenos Aires. It's very central and in the heart of my Palermo, where you can find lovely places to walk around and dine out. In addition, it's very close to the garden and the lake - my favorite places for a chilled & sunny morning in Buenos Aires.

Perfect place to stay for our quick visit. A large sunny balcony, quiet building, great location with fruit and veggie market on the corner, a cafe and great restaurant (Dandy) around the corner. Walk to Libertador or Las Heras to get anywhere. Super comfortable beds, plenty of towels and two full bathrooms (small but fine). Thanks!!
Excellent emplacement, près de restaurants, parcs et épicerie. Rue tranquille située dans un quartier très agréable. Appartement spacieux et confortable.

O apartamento é exatamente como nas fotos, muito confortável, completamente mobiliado e bem equipado. A localização é das melhores, o bairro é vibrante e utilitário, com vários bares, restaurantes, lojas e serviços por perto. Bem proximo a pontos turísticos, alguns é possível alcançar andando, se você gostar de caminhar. O aquecimento do apartamento é ótimo, dos melhores que já vi. Apesar do frio lá fora o apartamento tinha uma temperatura bastante confortável.
Stacy foi bem flexível no horário do checkin, pois estávamos indo de barco de Colonia del Sacramento e os barcos atrasaram. Informei a anfitriã de todas as mudanças e fomos recebidos pela Sra Hilda, que nos mostrou a casa e explicou tudo que precisávamos.
Recomento o apartamento e espero me hospedar lá novamente se voltar a Buenos Aires!
Everything was perfect. Thanks a lot!!!

Bright and airy, this apartment is a lovely place to call home while you visit the fabulous city of Buenos Aires. The beds are super comfy and the kitchen has all you need. The neighborhood is quiet, but there are lots of restaurants and shopping nearby. Stacy was very responsive to our needs and Hilda kept the place nice and clean. Definitely recommend.
Great home it was way bigger than it seemed in the photos. Beds were very comfortable! Was also close to the mall, parks, Palermo area.

Great base for checking out two of B.A.'s lovely neighborhoods, and close to the domestic airport. Stacy was very responsive to questions. Check-in was easy. Plenty of coffee shops nearby for breakfast and empanadas and walking distance to so many fantastic places!

As camas são confortáveis, o apartamento é bem aparelhado, o wifi funciona razoavelmente bem. Tanto o prédio como o bairro são seguros e bem localizados (perto do metrô e/ou pontos turísticos). Quase tudo perfeito, exceto pelas baratas que eram uma constante no apartamento.

A spacious apartment in a great neighborhood. We really enjoyed our stay. Stacy was kind enough to let us check in really early which was very welcomed after a long flight. Great host highly recommend it.

Es war ein toller Aufenthalt in Buenos Aires.  Perfekt gelegen und sehr konfortabel. 
Die Betten sind super bequem. Das Appartement ist ruhig!
Man fühlt sich sicher dort.
Geschmackvoll eingerichtet. 
Empfehlenswert.
Great location and building. Completely satisfied with this apartment.
Great central location, big apartment according to local standards. Abudant towels, dishwasher present!

We didnt see Stacy we only met the woman who is cleaning the place. she is very nice and convinent. stacy's place is perfect and suit the pictures on airbnb. the second shower doesnt work well though. we had a great time in Buenos Aires!
Awesome flat in a very high end and creative district, very recommended

Stacy's apartment was as we expected, easily can accommodate four people with all facilities to make you feel at home. Its location is perfect to get transport to anywhere, also you have nice places in a walk distance. Cafes and restaurants are around almost each corner giving you wide range of options to eat and drink.

I can highlight recommend this flat if you want to enjoy Buenos Aires.
Tolle Wohnung. Sehr sicher. Gute Ausstattung. Alles sauber. Betten hervorragend. Großer Balkon. Sehr schöner Stadtteil. Wir würden jederzeit wiederkommen.

The apartment was spacious and clean. It was nicely done and you feel at home in the homely environment.
All essentials for the stay were available for the us. Even stuff like city guides etc which is always a plus for travellers were made available. 
Overall it was a great experience and a comfortable stay.
Stacy's place is just as amazing as it looks! Totally beautiful and perfectly located. Hilde is as wonderful and helpful as everyone says. A great place to spend a week, we loved it!
Tudo perfeito. Camas confortáveis, apartamento funcional com todas comodidades e boa localização (fácil de pegar taxi e com supermercado muito próximo).

My fiance and I had a great stay! Stacy was very accommodating to let us arrive early and responded quickly to questions. The apartment is large and very cute. We were pleasantly surprised by how large the master bedroom and bed is, especially considering Argentina standards. We felt safe in the building and the location was great. We would definitely stay here again!
We had a perfect stay at the appartment. Great for a family, enough space! Good and queiet neighborhood.

Nice apartment in a beautiful area of Buenos Aires. You are near restaurants, supermarkets and attractions.
The apartment is big and everything is as described.
Recommended

Tivemos uma ótima experiência no apartamento de Stacy. É exatamente como descrito no anúncio e nas fotos. Ele é limpo e muito bem localizado. A responsável por nos receber, Hilda, é muito atenciosa e educada. Pode se hospedar sem qualquer problema.
reviews.response: Yes, so sorry about that! I am usually very prompt but buying a house/moving and also being in China unable to access my email was very difficult to be a good host. Thanks for being gracious :)

reviews.comments: Foi ótimo! A Stacy não estava no local combinado, mas deixou a Sra Hilda para nos recepcionar. Deu tudo certo. Apartamento excelente, local excepcional, bairro nobre, muito seguro. Não há garagem, mas meu carro ficou na rua a semana toda sem problemas. Há muitos carros estacionados e não há furtos. Mesmo assim, quase sem frente ao apartamento, tem um estacionamento 24h. Recomendo.

We enjoyed our time in this Palermo apartment.  It was in a nice location (quiet) and there were plenty of restaurants and grocery stores nearby.  The building was very secure and quiet.  Great for a family.  The Host recommended the right Taxi company to sue from the airport which was great.  Unfortunately, we were disappointed that upon arrival, there was no-one there to meet us.  We had to wait around 1 hour for the housekeeper to arrive.  We had a few maintenance issues in the apartment.  A short list of instructions and local contact details left in the apartment would have been useful.  The housekeeper did not speak English but was very nice and cleaned the apartment well.  We would recommend the apartment, however we think the communication aspect could be improved.
reviews.response: Sorry again! I panicked when I realized that I had forgot so I am truly sorry.  With moving and a new job I dropped the ball- my fault completely. :(

reviews.comments: Essa foi minha primeira experiência com o Airbnb e não poderia ser melhor. O apartamento é excelente, muito limpo, funcional e aconchegante. A localização do imóvel é muito boa. Tivemos um pequeno problema com a energia elétrica  que não prejudicou  nossa estadia. Nossa anfitriâ realmente pensa em todos os detalhes, proporcionando conforto e satisfação. A pessoa que nos recepcionou foi extremamente prestativa e simpática. Não vejo a hora de voltar a Buenos Aires e, se possível, me hospedarei com a Stacy novamente.

We were 4 days in Buenos Aires and had a great time.  Stacy's apartment is exactly like she describes it and pictures are very accurate.  It is well located, a short cab drive from most important places.  Stacy was very accommodating with our changes in schedule and we are thankful for that.  We would recommend staying here anytime!

Super schöne Wohnung, absolut sauber, liebevoll und persönlich eingerichtet. Die Küche ist voll ausgestattet. Morgens hatten wir Sonne auf dem schönen Balkon. Das Viertel ist super schön mit Restaurants, Supermärkten und alles was man sonst noch braucht. 

Die Übergabe durch Hilda war problemlos und auch der Kontakt mit Stacey war absolut top.

Gerne wieder! Haben uns sehr wohlgefühlt.

Great apartment! 
Perfect location in Palermo. Everything is close to the apartment. I contacted Hilda and she was waiting for us and gave us a very good introduction. 
The apartment is just like shown in the pictures. Very clean and comfortable. Everything is available in the kitchen. We always had breakfast there. 
Beds are very comfortable, we had a very good sleep. 
I will definitely recommend this apartment.

The apartment was great!  Very conveniently located in trendy Palermo.

Stacy's housekeeper met us at the apartment, it was clean and tidy, with everything we needed for a long weekend in BA.

Will definitely stay again if I'm every in BA.

Spacious and bright apartment, in a nice location.
Quiet and within walking distance from the Bosques de Palermo Park, Japanese Garden and all types of restaurants and shops.
I would definitely recommend it.

Stacy was great since the very beginning. This was my 1st time using airbnb and it was a wonderful experience. The apartment is in a great location and super spacious. I traveled with my 3 y.o son and he had a blast, there is a park only 2 blocks away and an ice cream store just across from it. What else can a 3 y.o ask for?! 
I contacted Stacy prior to our arrival to let her know that we were going to be arriving earlier at about noon time and since she didn't have anybody staying the night before she was able to let us check in earlier...that is precious when traveling with children! Hilda, they housekeeper, was waiting for us at the apartment, she showed us all the features and was super friendly and welcoming.
Thank you Stacy for sharing your apartment with us... We had a great time!!!!! See you next time!

Hilda (the house caretaker) met us at the apartment and gave us thorough house review and run down of its operation. House was perfect for a family and great location! Thanks for the awesome Buenos Aires experience.

The house was fantastic and in a great location. Stacy was very accommodating to our needs and easy to get a hold of. Hilda (the house care taker) was very nice and showed us the apartment. She ever helped us flag down a taxis when we were leaving. I would definitely stay here again if I came back to Buenos Aires.
This is our second time staying at her apartment.  I don't have enough nice words to describe how wonderful is this apartment, the area and the host.  Do not hesitate to book this apartment!
